1st Year EE101 Free

Circuit Analysis - Chapter 1: Basic Concepts

Introduction to Electrical Engineering

Introduction to fundamental circuit concepts including Ohm's Law, Kirchhoff's Laws, and basic circuit elements. Comprehensive notes with solved examples.

Circuit Fundamentals January 15, 2026

Circuit Analysis - Basic Concepts

This chapter provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamental concepts of electrical circuit analysis.

Topics Covered

  1. Voltage and Current

    • Definition and units
    • Reference directions
    • Passive sign convention

  2. Ohm’s Law

    • V = IR relationship
    • Resistance and conductance
    • Practical applications

  3. Kirchhoff’s Laws

    • Kirchhoff’s Current Law (KCL)
    • Kirchhoff’s Voltage Law (KVL)
    • Node and loop analysis

  4. Power and Energy

    • Power calculations
    • Energy consumption
    • Efficiency concepts

Additional Resources

  • Lecture slides available
  • Practice problems included
  • Video explanations linked
